resources.string:
For this app to work it needs DUMP permission to be granted. Unfortunately that is only possible through adb shell from your computer:

adb -d shell pm grant com.franco.demomode android.permission.DUMP

For transparency this app's source code is available.

For this app to work it needs WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission to be granted. Unfortunately that is only possible through adb shell from your computer:

adb -d shell pm grant com.franco.demomode android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

For transparency this app's source code is available.
Both permissions need to be granted for the tile to work
Make sure you allow demo mode to run by enabling it on Android settings, otherwise this tile might not work
